trans-unit.source: The DirectoryAttributeCollection class contains a collection of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: A DirectoryAttributeCollection osztály gyűjteményét tartalmazza <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektumok.

trans-unit.source: The DirectoryAttributeCollection constructor creates an instance of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: A DirectoryAttributeCollection konstruktor létrehoz egy példányát a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The Add method adds a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Az Add metódus ad egy <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum a gyűjteményhez.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object to add.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektumot hozzáadni.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index in the collection where the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> was added.
trans-unit.target: A gyűjtemény nulla alapú indexét ahol a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> hozzá lett adva.

trans-unit.source: attribute is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: attributenull hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: The AddRange method adds an array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Az addrange metódus használata metódus ad tömbje <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektumok a gyűjteményhez.

trans-unit.source: An array of <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: A tömb <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> hozzáadására a gyűjteményhez.

trans-unit.source: attributes is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: attributesnull hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: A member of attributes is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) or a member of attributes specifies a modification operation other than Add.
trans-unit.target: Tagja attributes null hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben) vagy egy másik attributes adja meg egy eltérő Hozzáadás módosítása művelet.

trans-unit.source: The AddRange method adds a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"></xref> object to the current collection.
trans-unit.target: Az addrange metódus használata metódus ad egy <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"> </xref> az aktuális gyűjtemény objektumhoz.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"></xref> object to add to this collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"> </xref> objektum hozzáadására a gyűjteményhez.

trans-unit.source: attributeCollection is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: attributeCollectionnull hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: The Contains method determines whether this <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"></xref> object contains a specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A Contains mód határozza meg, hogy ez <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"> </xref> objektum tartalmazza a megadott <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object for which to search.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektumot keresni.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> is part of the collection; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> otherwise.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Ha a megadott <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> része a gyűjtemény; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> más módon.

trans-unit.source: The CopyTo method copies the entire collection to a one-dimensional array, starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: A CopyTo metódus másolja a teljes gyűjteményt a céltömb megadott indextől kezdődő egydimenziós tömb.

trans-unit.source: ## Exceptions |Exception|Condition| |---------------|---------------| |ArgumentNullException|`array` is a null reference (`Nothing` in Visual Basic).| |ArgumentOutOfRangeException|`index` is less than zero.| |ArgumentException|`array` is multidimensional
trans-unit.target: ##Kivételek |} Kivétel |} Az állapot |} |---------------|---------------| | ArgumentNullException |} `array` null hivatkozás (`Nothing` a Visual Basic nyelvben). |} | ArgumentOutOfRangeException |} `index` kisebb nullánál. |} | ArgumentException |} `array` többdimenziós

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: -vagy-

trans-unit.source: The number of elements in the source <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection> is greater than the available space from `index` to the end of the destination `array`.| |InvalidCastException|The type of the source <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection> cannot be cast automatically to the type of the destination `array`.|
trans-unit.target: A forrás <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection>elemeinek száma nagyobb, mint a rendelkezésre álló terület `index` a cél végére `array`. |} | InvalidCastException |} A forrás típusa <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection>nem konvertálható automatikusan a cél típusa `array`. |}</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection> </xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection>

trans-unit.source: A one-dimensional array that is the destination of the elements copied from the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Egydimenziós tömb, amely a cél átmásolva elem a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `array` where copying begins.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét `array` ahol másolása kezdődik.

trans-unit.source: The IndexOf method returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object in the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A IndexOf metódus visszaadja a megadott első előfordulásának nulla alapú indexét <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object for which the index is returned.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> az index visszaadott objektum.

trans-unit.source: The index value of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object, if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: A megadott index értékének <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum található, ha sikertelen, ha a -1.

trans-unit.source: The Insert method inserts the specified object into the at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Az Insert metódus szúrja be a megadott az objektum a a meghatározott index .

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index point, in the collection, at which to insert the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét pontot, a gyűjtemény, szúrja be a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object to be inserted into the collection.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> a gyűjteményhez beszúrni kívánt objektum.

trans-unit.source: value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic) or value specifies a modification operation other than Add.
trans-unit.target: valuenull hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben) vagy value adja meg egy eltérő Hozzáadás módosítása művelet.

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero, or index is greater than the number of elements in the object.
trans-unit.target: indexkisebb, mint nulla, vagy index elemeinek száma nagyobb a objektum.

trans-unit.source: The Item property contains the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Az elemtulajdonság tartalmazza a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: ## Exceptions |Exception|Condition| |---------------|---------------| |ArgumentException|You attempted to set the property to `null`.|
trans-unit.target: ##Kivételek |} Kivétel |} Az állapot |} |---------------|---------------| | ArgumentException |} A tulajdonsága próbált `null`. |}

trans-unit.source: The index value of the <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Az index értékének a <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum a megadott indexnél.

trans-unit.source: The OnValidate method verifies that value is a object or specifies an add operation.
trans-unit.target: A OnValidate metódus ellenőrzi, hogy value van egy objektumot, vagy adja meg a hozzáadási művelet.

trans-unit.source: The object to evaluate.
trans-unit.target: Az objektum kiértékeléséhez.

trans-unit.source: This exception can occur under one of the following conditions: - value is a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Ez a kivétel fordulhat elő, a következő feltételek egyike mellett:- value null hivatkozás ( a Visual Basic nyelvben).

trans-unit.source: - value is not a object.
trans-unit.target: - value is not a object.

trans-unit.source: The Remove method removes the first occurrence of the specified <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: A Remove metódust eltávolítja a megadott első előfordulásának <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum a gyűjteményből.

trans-unit.source: Exceptions |Exception|Condition| |---------------|---------------| |NotSupportedException|<xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection> is read-only or has a fixed size.|
trans-unit.target: Kivételek |} Kivétel |} Az állapot |} |---------------|---------------| | NotSupportedException |} <xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection>csak olvasható vagy rögzített méretű rendelkezik. |}</xref:System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttributeCollection>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"></xref> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.DirectoryAttribute"> </xref> objektum eltávolítása.
